newsentry.title: MyCoRe Conference Call
newsentry.message: The MyCoRe developers are offering an open MyCoRe telephone conference: Please contact the MyCoRe office.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Conference Participation
newsentry.message: At 1st of June we offered a MyCoRe-Workshop at the Bibliothekartag 2017 in Frankfurt a.M.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Update
newsentry.message: MIR and Skeleton are using the current LongTermSupport release version 2017.06.
